alert.note: Alert for Barren; Edmonson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 3:26AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL WARREN...NORTHWESTERN BARREN AND SOUTHERN EDMONSON COUNTIES THROUGH 300 AM CDT... At 225 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Plum Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Brownsville, Plum Springs, Crestmoor, Memphis Junction, Mount Victor, Smiths Grove, Oakland, Three Forks and Chalybeate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
